name: North Water Pro Throw Line 1/4" SpectrA
description: A professional-grade throw line. The bag is streamlined for long, accurate tosses and stuffs fast for quick rethrows. 3 internal pockets hold glow sticks or a rope log. It attaches to Northwater’s Quick-Click Waist Belt, EDS and Quick Draw Belt Systems for the well-equipped rescuer.Mesh panels promote quick draining and drying.6.4mm (¼in.) line has a Spectra core for high tensile strength and low stretch, and a polypropylene sheath for flotation.
